titles.title: Know Where to Go in an Emergency Act of 2019

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, title XXVII of the Public Health Service Act, and the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to require group health plans and health insurance issuers to include on any insurance card issued by such plan or issuer information on the nearest in-network hospital or urgent care facility.
Know Where to Go in an Emergency Act of 2019

bill.summary: Know Where to Go in an Emergency Act of 2019 This bill requires private health insurance plans to identify on insurance membership cards the in-network hospital or urgent care facility nearest to the primary residence of the plan holder.
